decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (As Amended) | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing/plan titles: Site and Block Plan (ref. exPL1); Proposed Ground Floor Plan & Front Elevation (ref. proPL3 Rev 1)	.
REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse and shall be consistent with those as listed within the submitted application form and the drawings / plans as listed in Condition 2.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with the Acton Green Conservation Area Management Plan (2008) and policies HC1, D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B, 7C and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan (2013).

| Details of the replacement windows hereby approved shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the development is commenced and this condition shall apply notwithstanding any indications as to these matters which have been given in this application. The details shall include 1:20 cross sectional drawings, materials, transoms, glazing, fixings and ironmongery. Development shall be carried out in accordance with the approved details.

REASON: To ensure that the development harmonises with the character and appearance of the dwelling and would preserve the special character and appearance of the Bedford Park Conservation Area, in accordance with the Bedford Park Conservation Area Management Plan, policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies HC1, D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Installation of window in lieu of garage door
